nodes.text: Fi-Ek Sirch was a male Kajain'sa'Nikto Jedi Knight who served the Jedi Order in the waning days of the Galactic Republic. Wielding a blue lightsaber, he was one of many Jedi chosen as part of the strike team led by Jedi Master Mace Windu to the planet Geonosis to rescue Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, and Padmé Amidala. During the fighting, which came be known as the First Battle of Geonosis and the start of the Clone Wars, Sirch was likely killed by battle droids.
A toy of the character labeled "Nikto Jedi Knight," was released by Hasbro in 2002. An updated version of the figure was released, using the character's name, in 2011.
